summary: A group of disillusioned American expatriate writers live a dissolute, hedonistic lifestyle in 1920s France and Spain.
cast: Tyrone Power|Ava Gardner|Mel Ferrer|Errol Flynn|Eddie Albert|Gregory Ratoff|Juliette Gréco|Marcel Dalio|Henry Daniell|Bob Cunningham|Danik Patisson|Robert Evans|Ricardo Adalid|Ann Codee|Jacqueline Evans|Lilia Guízar|Rebeca Iturbide|Estela Larralde|Lee Morgan|Carlos Múzquiz|Claudia Eckert Noonan|Eduardo Noriega|Carlos David Ortigos|Alberto Pedret|Louise Ross
title: Fiesta
